imdb.plot outline: "The Mathias Richling show" not only opens the door to the studio, but the eyes of the viewers to the relationships and the turmoil of politics. Mathias Richling - the man of a thousand faces slips mercilessly into his guest roles and is always better and honest than the originals. Merkel, Schäuble, Stoiber and Co. are happy seen "guests".
imdb.title: Die Mathias Richling Show
plot: "The Mathias Richling show" not only opens the door to the studio, but the eyes of the viewers to the relationships and the turmoil of politics. Mathias Richling - the man of a thousand faces slips mercilessly into his guest roles and is always better and honest than the originals. Merkel, Schäuble, Stoiber and Co. are happy seen "guests".
